extensionDescription.message: Use content script to traverse DOM and collect information from the active tab.

sidebarTitle.description: Title that labels the sidebar information

contentTitle.description: Page title retrieved by content script

contentURL.description: Page URL retrieved by content script

tabIsLoading.description: Message indicating that content in the sidebar panel is being updated.

protocolNotSupported.message: Protocol not supported; unable to retrieve content information.
protocolNotSupported.description: Message explaining that content script cannot be executed.
